name: Elven Arrows – Mixed Reality Bow & Arrow
summary: Welcome to Elven Arrows, an immersive Mixed Reality game that transforms your environment into a free roam VR watchtower. Defend the realm behind your walls, move freely around your space, and protect ancient crystals from ruthless invaders. Arm yourself with a bow and arrow (plus mystical upgrades!), coordinate with friends in co-located multiplayer, or fight solo. Step into the tower and let your home become the final defense!
